events.title: Lightning Network Workshop
events.description: Hands-on workshop exploring Lightning Network channels, routing, and payment flows. Bring your laptop and learn to set up your own Lightning node.

schedule.title: Introduction and Setup
schedule.description: Welcome and introduction to the workshop. Get your development environment set up.

schedule.title: Lightning Network Fundamentals
schedule.description: Learn the core concepts of Lightning Network including payment channels, routing, and network architecture.

schedule.title: Hands-on Lab
schedule.description: Practical workshop session. Set up your own Lightning node on testnet and make your first Lightning payments.

schedule.title: Q&A and Networking
schedule.description: Open discussion, questions, and networking with fellow builders.

sections.title: What You'll Learn
sections.body: This workshop covers the fundamentals of Lightning Network operations, including channel management, routing strategies, and practical payment applications. Participants will set up a testnet node and make their first Lightning payments.

sections.title: Prerequisites
sections.body: Basic understanding of Bitcoin recommended. Laptop with Docker installed preferred but not required.

meta.title: Lightning Network Workshop | Builder Vancouver
meta.description: Hands-on Lightning Network workshop. Learn to set up nodes, manage channels, and make payments.

events.title: Builder Vancouver Launch Event
events.description: Join us for the inaugural Builder Vancouver event! We'll introduce the Builder movement, explore Vancouver's Bitcoin ecosystem, and kick off our monthly meetup series. This is the perfect opportunity to meet fellow builders, learn about our community, and get involved.

schedule.title: Doors Open & Networking
schedule.description: Welcome! Grab a drink, meet fellow builders, and get settled in.

schedule.title: Welcome to Builder Vancouver
schedule.description: Introduction to Builder Vancouver, our mission, vision, and what makes Vancouver a great Bitcoin builder city.

schedule.title: Break
schedule.description: Short break for refreshments and networking.

schedule.title: Open Discussion & Q&A
schedule.description: Open discussion about Bitcoin building, Lightning Network, and what you'd like to see in future meetups.

schedule.title: Networking & Collaboration
schedule.description: Continue the conversation, share ideas, and connect with fellow builders.

sections.title: What to Expect
sections.body: This inaugural event will introduce you to Builder Vancouver and our community. We'll cover what Builder is, why Vancouver is a great Bitcoin builder city, and what to expect at future meetups. There will be plenty of time for questions, discussion, and networking.

sections.title: Who Should Attend
sections.body: Everyone is welcome! Whether you're a seasoned Bitcoin developer, a designer interested in Bitcoin UX, a curious newcomer, or someone building Bitcoin products - there's a place for you in our community.

sections.title: Getting There
sections.body: Location details will be announced closer to the event date. Follow us on social media for updates.

meta.title: Builder Vancouver Launch Event | Builder Vancouver
meta.description: Join us for the inaugural Builder Vancouver event! Introduction to Builder, Vancouver's Bitcoin ecosystem, and kick off our monthly meetup series.
